text:
The potion fizzes as it passes over your tongue. You notice no effect other than a chalky aftertaste.

"Don't you worry," mutters the hag. "That's what it's meant to taste like. I can't always get the bat's entrails, you know. If you want to buy a bottle to drink later, that'll be two gold cons." She cackles so hideously that you almost cover your ears.

choices.text: You don't want any more potions
